QuestData.Title: Old Divisions
QuestData.Description: Lord Darius Crowley has been called many things. Rebel. Traitor. Terrorist.$B$BBefore the civil war I called him... friend.$B$BI never blamed him for leading an insurrection against me. His land and people were separated from Gilneas by a stone wall... but we had no choice.$B$BRegardless... Crowley is exactly the type of person we need now.$B$BEnter Stoneward Prison and ask Captain Broderick about Crowley's whereabouts. I'd send my own men, but there's still bad blood.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Captain Broderick inside Stoneward Prison in Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: Greymane wants to save Crowley? Has he gone mad?
